TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebServiceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebServiceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WebServiceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: Used to add additional information to an XML Web service, such as a string describing its functionality.

span.span: Used to add additional information to an XML Web service, such as a string describing its functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不是必需的 XML Web 服务发布和执行。The is not required for an XML Web service to be published and executed. 可以使用`WebServiceAttribute`指定不受服务说明和服务帮助页中用于 XML Web 服务的公共语言运行时标识符的规则的 XML Web 服务的名称。You can use the `WebServiceAttribute` to specify a name for the XML Web service that is not restricted by the rules for a common language runtime identifier, which is used in the service description and the Service help page for the XML Web service. XML Web 服务应更改其默认 XML 命名空间，然后再将其公钥。An XML Web service should change its default XML namespace before it is made public. 每个 XML Web 服务需要使用唯一的 XML 命名空间来识别它，以便客户端应用程序可进行区分从其他服务在 Web 上找到。Each XML Web service needs a unique XML namespace to identify it so that client applications can distinguish it from other services on the Web. http://tempuri.org/ 对于 XML Web 服务的开发，但发布的 XML Web 服务应使用更持久的命名空间才可用。http://tempuri.org/ is available for XML Web services that are under development, but published XML Web services should use a more permanent namespace. 应由您控制的 XML 命名空间标识您的 XML Web 服务。Your XML Web service should be identified by a XML namespace that you control. 例如，您可以使用公司的 Internet 域名的 XML 命名空间的一部分。For example, you could use your company's Internet domain name as part of the XML namespace. 尽管许多 XML Web 服务 XML 命名空间如下所示的 Url，但它们需要不指向实际资源在 Web 上找到。Although many XML Web service XML namespaces look like URLs, they need not point to an actual resource on the Web. （XML Web 服务 XML 命名空间是 Uri。）对于使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web 服务，默认 XML 命名空间可以使用更改属性。(XML Web service XML namespaces are URIs.) For XML Web services created using ASP.NET, the default XML namespace can be changed using property. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例设置的属性到`"Common Server Variables"`并将 XML 命名空间设置为`http://www.microsoft.com/`。The following example sets the property of the to `"Common Server Variables"` and sets the XML namespace to `http://www.microsoft.com/`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceAttribute Example](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceAttribute Example](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: A descriptive message for the XML Web service.

span.span: A descriptive message for the XML Web service.

value.span: 描述 XML Web 服务的功能的文本。

span.span: The text describing the functionality of the XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 描述性消息是 XML Web 服务的预期使用者时显示生成的 XML Web 服务的说明文档，如服务说明和服务帮助页。The descriptive message is displayed to prospective consumers of the XML Web service when description documents for the XML Web service are generated, such as the Service Description and the Service help page. ## Examples 下面的示例设置属性设置为`"Common Server Variables"`。The following example sets the property to `"Common Server Variables"`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceAttribute Example](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceAttribute Example](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the XML Web service.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the XML Web service.
The name for the XML Web service.

value.span: 默认值是实现 XML Web 服务的类名称。

span.span: Default value is the name of the class implementing the XML Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户导航到 XML Web 服务的 URL，并提供了一个查询字符串的生成服务说明？WSDL。The Service Description is generated when a user navigates to the URL for the XML Web service and supplies a query string of ?WSDL. 在服务说明中，属性标识的 XML Web 服务的 XML 限定名的本地部分。Within the Service Description, the property identifies the local part of the XML qualified name for the XML Web service. `Name`属性还用于服务帮助页上显示的 XML Web 服务的名称。The `Name` property is also used to display the name of the XML Web service on the Service help page. 预期使用者定位到 XML Web 服务的 the.asmx 页而无需指定 XML Web 服务方法名称和其参数时，将显示服务帮助页。The Service help page is displayed when a prospective consumer navigates to the.asmx page for the XML Web service without specifying an XML Web service method name and its parameters. XML 限定的名称用于区分具有相同名称与 XML 文档的元素。An XML qualified name is used to disambiguate elements with the same name with an XML document. XML 限定的名由以冒号分隔的以下两个部分组成： 命名空间或前缀与命名空间和本地部分相关联。An XML qualified name consists of the following two parts separated by a colon: namespace or a prefix associated with a namespace and local part. 命名空间包含一个 URI 引用，并为服务说明的目的，是的值属性。The namespace consists of a URI reference and for the purposes of the Service Description, is the value of the property. 一般情况下，一个前缀，其作用类似一个 URI 的别名，是的命名空间关联，以便所有后续的 XML 限定名称使用的命名空间可以使用缩短的前缀。In general, a prefix, which acts like an alias to an URI, is associated with the namespace, so that all subsequent XML qualified names using the namespace can use the shortened prefix. 本地部分是以字母或不含空格的下划线开头的字符串。The local part is a string beginning with a letter or underscore containing no spaces. 因此，标识在服务说明中的 XML Web 服务的 XML 限定的名称是采用以下格式：Therefore, the XML qualified name identifying a XML Web service in the Service Description is in the following format: : : 有关详细信息 XML 限定名，请参阅[XML 1.0 中的命名空间](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)。For more information on XML qualified names, see [Namespaces in XML 1.0](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/). ## Examples 下面的示例设置的 XML Web 服务的`MyName`。The following example sets of the XML Web service to `MyName`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceAttribute.Name Example](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute.Name Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceAttribute.Name Example](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute.Name Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Namespace : string with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the default XML namespace to use for the XML Web service.

span.span: Gets or sets the default XML namespace to use for the XML Web service.

value.span: 要用于 XML Web 服务的默认 XML 命名空间。

span.span: The default XML namespace to use for the XML Web service.
The default is specified in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 命名空间提供了一种方法来创建名称，由统一资源标识符 (URI) 标识的 XML 文档中。XML namespaces offer a way to create names in an XML document that are identified by a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 通过使用 XML 命名空间可以唯一地标识元素或 XML 文档中的属性。By using XML namespaces you can uniquely identify elements or attributes in a XML document. 在 XML 中，特别是在 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 定义的 XML Web 服务的服务说明。The service description for a XML Web service is defined in XML, specifically in Web Services Description Language (WSDL). XML Web 服务，服务说明中用作直接与 XML Web 服务有关的 XML 元素的默认命名空间。Within the Service Description for an XML Web service, is used as the default namespace for XML elements directly pertaining to the XML Web service. 例如，XML Web 服务和 XML Web 服务方法的名称与在指定的命名空间`Namespace`属性。For example, the name of the XML Web service and its XML Web service methods pertain to the namespace specified in the `Namespace` property. 特定于 WSDL 的元素属于命名空间。Elements that are specific to WSDL pertain to the namespace. 对于 XML Web 服务客户端使用 SOAP 调用 XML Web 服务，你可以选择添加或调用 XML Web 服务方法。For XML Web service clients using SOAP to call an XML Web service, you can optionally add the or to call an XML Web service method. 如果客户端调用使用 ASP.NET 创建的 XML Web 服务，并属性都派生自属性默认情况下。If the client is calling an XML Web service created using ASP.NET, the , and properties are all derived from the property by default. 例如，给定的 XML Web 服务方法名称`Time`和一个`Namespace`的属性`http://www.contoso.com/`，则`Action`属性是`http://www.contoso.com/Time`默认情况下。For instance, given an XML Web service method name of `Time` and a `Namespace` property of `http://www.contoso.com/`, the `Action` property is `http://www.contoso.com/Time` by default. 若要更改的默认设置`RequestNamespace`， `ResponseNamespace`，并`Action`XML Web 服务方法，可以添加给 XML Web 服务方法。To change the default settings for `RequestNamespace`, `ResponseNamespace`, and `Action` for an XML Web service method, you can add a to the XML Web service method. > [!NOTE] > XML 命名空间是类驻留在中的术语的命名空间不同[!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]。An XML namespace is different from the namespace the class resides in, in terms of the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/includes/winsdklong-md.md)]. 若要指定类的命名空间，请参阅[Namespace 关键字](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/namespace-keywords.md)如果您在 C# 中编写。To specify the namespace for the class, see [Namespace Keywords](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/namespace-keywords.md) if you writing in C#. ## Examples 下面的示例设置到`http://www.contoso.com`，并且将替代为该命名空间通过添加属性到`Time`XML Web 服务方法。The following example sets to `http://www.contoso.com` and overrides that namespace for the property by adding a to the `Time` XML Web service method. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic WebServiceAttribute.Namespace Example](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute.Namespace Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic WebServiceAttribute.Namespace Example](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebServiceAttribute.Namespace Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]
